dct_title_s: Caspian & Black Sea : oil and gas activity and concession map 2013
dct_description_sm: Depths shown by isolines and gradient tints. "Map projection: Latitude/Longitude (WGS84)." Includes abbreviation list,statistical tables, and graphs. Shows gas fields, oil fields, gas pipelines, oil pipelines, refineries, concession blocks. Includes notes, graphs, and small-scale inset of eastern former Soviet Central-Asian republics. "Copyright: The map is the exclusive copyright of the publishers and may not be reproduced in whole or part whithout the written authority of the publishers." "Map data corrected as of April 2013" Includes advertisements. Map sponsors: Clarksons Platou offshore and Dunlop oil & marine.
dct_subject_sm: Oil and gas leases—Caspian Sea Region—Maps
Oil and gas leases—Former Soviet republics—Maps
dcat_theme_sm: Oil and gas leases—Caspian Sea Region—Maps
